name.description: must be a string and is required

created_by.description: must be an ObjectId referencing the user who created the album

photos.description: must be an array of photo objects

url.description: must be a string representing the URL of the photo and is required

uploaded_by.description: must be an ObjectId referencing the user who uploaded the photo and is required

timestamp.description: must be a date representing when the photo was uploaded and is required

caption.description: must be a string representing the caption for the photo

discussion_thread.description: must be an ObjectId referencing the discussion thread for the photo
